title: Awful!
comment: Worst migraine tracker ever. First off to record the time you're supposed to click when the migraine starts and when it stops. Migraines can last for days!! And if you are like me it never fully goes away. It just gets worse, goes down to bearable, then shoots back up. You can't even record ANYTHING!  No triggers, no symptoms, no medications used, nothing useful. You may as well use a stopwatch because that's what this is. Uninstalling!!

title: It is overall a good app.
comment: It does exactly what it says well. I would like to see a few features added.

title: Hate it!
comment: I tried recording my migraine this morning and it didn't record
I found an issue where if you force closed the app or restarted the phone, the events in progress get lost.  Should be fixed in the next release.

title: Could be great
comment: Could be great app. Needs more functionality. Need to be able to edit or add. Love how easy to start/stop but needs ti be adjustable. Hopeful for changes or will uninstall
Editing the severity ratings and adding notes are in-place.  I hope to have editable start/stop times soon.
Didn't feel there was enough to track.  Wanted to track treatments and triggers such this app didn't do.
There is now a notes section for tracking any additional information.
I would like to see ability to add what needs you took and what symptoms you had
